tool_description: Query & real-time stream API to access all +18 million SEC EDGAR filings published since 1993
name: SEC Filings
title: SEC Filings

api_list.name: SEC Filings Query API
api_list.description: Query all SEC EDGAR filings using the POST endpoint. Request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sec-filings1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sec-filings1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Full-Text Search API
api_list.description:
You can search by keyword, ticker, company name, CIK number, and/or reporter’s last name—individually or in combination.

Boolean operators allow for searches where all words entered are required to be in the resulting documents, exact phrases matching, exclude terms, OR logic clauses, and wildcards. Any of these can be combined in a single search.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sec-filings1.p.rapidapi.com/full-text-search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sec-filings1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
